channel.description: Recent content in me on ybane.me

item.title: Why Start a Blog?
item.description: I figure a good first post for a blog is an explanation of why the blog exists in the first place. Why do it? I want to start blogging for a simple reason: I want to write more often and I think it’s more fun to write where other people can read what you say. I hope that having this public space inspires me to do that. What’s with the name?
